actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

official_title: A bill to amend titles 26 and 38, United States Code, to make permanent certain income verification and pension provisions of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1990.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code and other Federal law to provide for the permanent use of Internal Revenue Service and social security data by the Department of Veterans Affairs for income verification. Makes permanent the reduction in pension for a veteran who does not have a spouse or a child and receives Medicaid-covered nursing home care.

titles.title: A bill to amend titles 26 and 38, United States Code, to make permanent certain income verification and pension provisions of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1990.
